name: Copper Stormforge

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
text: Copper has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
text: <$title_short_name$> has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

action.name: Multiattack
text: Copper makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, ranged 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

description: Source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage p. 30
